Package client

Class AnswerClient

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
client.AnswerClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet(urlPatterns={"answerclient","/addallanswer","/showresults"})
public class AnswerClient
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Author:
Daniel AnswerClient will process the submitted questionnaire answers for both voters and candidates. User will be identified based on the session data (user_id and role), which will determine the chain of actions.
See Also:

    • evaluateAllCandidates

      public java.util.List<Candidate> evaluateAllCandidates​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, java.util.List<Candidate> candidateListStacked, java.util.List<Answer> answerListSubmitted, java.util.List<Question> questionList)
      Method will compare all candidate answers to the voter answers and assign a score based on the numerical differences
      Parameters:
      request - takes current HTTP request as arg
      candidateListStacked - List of Candidate objects containing all the available candidate profile data
      answerListSubmitted - contains all the submitted answer data as a List of Answer type
      questionList - conatins all the question data associated with the questionnaire
      Returns:
      scored candidate list
